title: The man who debated himself: 2 claims by Kenya presidency hopeful rated
subtitle: In Kenya, six running-mates to presidential candidates were expected for a live debate at Nairobi’s Catholic University on 17 July. Only one took to the podium. Did Muthiora Eliud Kariara have his facts right? We checked.
author: africacheck.org
